*Mighty Mouse: The New Adventures
1:
--------------------
Text: Mighty Mouse: The New Adventures:  Produced by Bakshi-Hyde Ventures (a joint venture of animator Ralph Bakshi and producer John W. Hyde) and Terrytoons, it aired on CBS on Saturday mornings from fall 1987 through the 1988–89 season.

Text: Mighty Mouse: The New Adventures:  It was briefly rerun on Saturday mornings on Fox Kids in November 1992.
